title: buffer overflow error alert
extract: Buffer Overflow. A buffer overflow is a programming error that allows data to exist in memory that it should not be allowed to access. ... This can cause no problem if that memory is not other-wised used or very serious problems if that area of memory contains other buffers, variables, or program execution code.Feb 27, 2013
extract_html: Buffer Overflow. A buffer overflow is a programming error that allows data to exist in memory that it should not be allowed to access. ... This can cause no problem if that memory is not other-wised used or very serious problems if that area of memory contains other buffers, variables, or program execution code.Feb 27, 2013
